tasks.label: Build Demo2_Command
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/demo2-command-approuter/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js ] || [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/demo2-command-approuter/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js ]; then npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock; fi
